EmailTemplate.description: Sent when an LCF Grant Offer Letter Baseline is issued
EmailTemplate.name: Grant Offer Letter Baseline issued
EmailTemplate.subject: LCF Grant Management: offer letter baseline form has been issued
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!LCF_Grant__c.Contact_Name__c},
A Life Chances Fund grant offer letter baseline form has been issued by your funding officer, reference {!LCF_Grant__c.Name}. Please login to the LCF portal to review.
If you have any further queries, please get back to us at lifechancesfund@biglotteryfund.org.uk with the above reference.
Kind Regards, Centre for Social Impact Bonds
